name: Minitaur's Labyrinth
description:
You play as Theseus, the legend who defeated the infamous Minotaur. You must find the minitaur, kill him and head back out where you came from! Simple right? But its a maze so its not... But thank god Ariadne gave you a sword to fight and a ball of thread to know where you're going... Now go! fulfill the prophecy!

How to play:
WASD - Move
Left Click - Attack
Right Click - Use Thread

Credit:
Art, sound and level design: Chibs
Programming: Cogh
Music: Brian Mowat

This is a game entry for mini jam VII made in 48 hours.
The theme was "greek mythology".
